name: Etherfuse USTRY
description: Etherfuse is committed to democratizing access to real-world assets through the tokenization of sovereign bonds. Our mission is to eliminate the barriers and opacity of the traditional systems, by making it possible for anyone to invest in tokenized bonds. Each Etherfuse Stablebond token is backed by an underlying bond denominated in local currency that earns yield and matures continuously. Stablebonds are the closest thing to a checking account on chain.
